name: Duplex (btsherratt)
description:
Thanks for looking at Duplex.  This is a small puzzle game, more of a proof of concept to see if the idea works. 8 simple levels, probably around 5-10 minutes of playtime.

Move your robot and try to get to the exit, but be careful! If you line up with another robot you will autoconnect to it and start matching movement. Sometimes this will be to your advantage, but not always...

Controls are arrow keys or WASD for movement. R to reset.

Duplex was made for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam, but if you try it out and like it, please let me know @btsherratt and I might consider turning it into a proper project in the future!

ACCESSIBILITY WARNING: There is screen shake, and no way to turn it off in this build. Please be careful.

Typeface is "Lazy Town" by Chevy Ray, you can buy it here: https://chevyray.itch.io/pixel-fonts
